name: Zephyr Protocol Reserve Share
description: Zephyr Reserve Shares represent a share of the Zephyr Protocol reserves equity. It is received in return for adding ZEPH into the reserve, thus minters/holders become “Reserve Providers”. Zephyr Reserve Share ($ZRS) holders receive a portion of the block reward every block as premium for providing the backing power for Zephyr Stable Dollar ($ZSD). Reserve Providers are effectively betting on Zephyr, in terms of value and adoption.
